lyrics:
I've been waiting to tell you this
You are, all that a man could ever want
Listen,


I stepped in a club in your hood
I slowly turned left and there you stood
You and your friends talkin'
But then our eyes connect and moved in

It was just like 2-ways on beam
I'm your king be my queen
What did you want to do tonight
My truck is parked out front so lets ride

Chorus:

I can read your mind, babe (ohh)
I know what you're thinkin' (I know what you're thinkin', baby)
Its alright (with me, baby)
Its alright, yes

I can read your mind, babe (I can)
I know what you're thinkin' (I know what you're thinkin', baby)
Its alright (with me, yeah)
Its alright, yes


So baby take a ride with me
And I'll fulfill all your fantasies
And when the rain starts pourin' down
Then all the love that's lost will be found

I'll make your mind loose control
Over your body that's my goal
So baby just come down here
Just let the gravity pull you near

Chorus:

I can read your mind, babe (I can)
I know what you're thinkin' (I know what you're thinkin')
Its alright (can you feel me, yeah)
Its alright, yes

I can read your mind, babe (just me and you right now)
I know what you're thinkin' (I got an idea babe)
Its alright (ohh, yeah)
Its alright, yes

Bridge:

I know you wanna rub (rub)
I know you wanna touch (touch)
I know you wanna feel (feel)
So baby keep it real

I know you wanna see (see)
I know you wanna be (be)
In my B-E-D
Grindin' slowly

I know you wanna rub (rub)
I know you wanna touch (touch)
I know you wanna feel (feel)
So baby keep it real

I know you wanna see (see)
I know you wanna be (be)
In my B-E-D
Grindin' slowly

Chorus:

I can read your mind, babe (I can read it)
I know what you're thinkin' (and I know)
Its alright (you see, I know, you know, cause I can feel it too)
Its alright, yes

I can read your mind, babe (just me and you, yeah)
I know what you're thinkin' (I know, yeah)
Its alright (ohh, yeah)
Its alright, yes

I wanna love baby (that's what I wanna do to you)
I wanna feel you (if you come, if you come)
I wanna love baby (ohh, yeah)
I wanna feel you (I wanna feel you, girl)

I wanna love baby (come on and go with me)
I wanna feel you (I want you to stay with me)....
